scripts.pretest: npm run jsdoc-json && cp doc.json website/
scripts.prebuild: npm run jsdoc-json && cp doc.json website/
scripts.prestart: npm run jsdoc-json && cp doc.json website/
scripts.repl: npm run prestart && cd website && npm run dev
scripts.start: npm run prestart && cd website && npm run dev
scripts.dev: npm run prestart && cd website && npm run dev
scripts.build: npm run prebuild && cd website && npm run build
scripts.build:heroku: NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=2048' npm run prebuild && cd website && NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=2048' MODE=heroku npx astro build --config astro.config.heroku.mjs
scripts.build:heroku:static: NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=2048' npm run prebuild && cd website && NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=2048' npx astro build --config astro.config.static.mjs
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run build:heroku && npm run cleanup:heroku
scripts.cleanup:heroku: rm -rf node_modules/.pnpm packages/*/node_modules test/ docs/ examples/ tools/ samples/ my-patterns/ .git/
scripts.jsdoc-json: jsdoc packages/core packages/mini packages/codemirror packages/csound packages/draw packages/tonal packages/transpiler packages/webaudio --template ./node_modules/jsdoc-json --destination doc.json -c jsdoc/jsdoc.config.json
scripts.report-undocumented: npm run jsdoc-json && node jsdoc/undocumented.mjs > undocumented.json
scripts.check: npm run format-check && npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.iclc: cd paper && pandoc --template=pandoc/iclc.html --citeproc  --number-sections iclc2023.md -o iclc2023.html && pandoc --template=pandoc/iclc.latex --citeproc --number-sections iclc2023.md -o iclc2023.pdf
